bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign identical with luan quan 攣拳 . Qi xiao liang fang 奇效良方 64: 治…小腹痛引腰脊攣曲， 身不能直 , “It cures pain in the lower abdomen that pulls on lower back and spine causing a cramp that does not allow a person to straighten the body”.

②An appearance in the growth of plants when twigs and branches assume a crooked instead of straight appearance. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry rui xiang 瑞香：攣枝者， 其節攣曲，如斷折之狀也 , “Bent twigs have joints where they are crooked , as if they had been broken”.
